Posts.Content: I developed RA in the wrist I fractured while taking arimidex. I was on it for 2-1/2 yrs and accepted that joint pains were result of old age (78). I'm now off arimidex 3 wks, Onc. wants me to switch to aromasin but I'm afraid pain will be the same. Did your joint pains subside after 6 wks med free?
Posts.Title: Arimidex Side Effects

Posts.Content: I just read your article on avemar and wondered if it is being prescribed for ER+ breast cancer and if there are side effects..
Posts.Title: avemar

Posts.Content: I've been on Arimidex for almost 4 years along with joint pains mostly in the hand and wrist I fractured.  Will this pain go away after I'm off the Arimidex or is it already too late?
Posts.Title: arimidex
